body: `8.0.0` and `8.0.1` are available on Github. I'm not sure if `7.1.0r` is still available at [http://www.earthsystemmodeling.org/esmf_releases/public/ESMF_7_1_0r/esmf_7_1_0r_src.tar.gz](http://www.earthsystemmodeling.org/esmf_releases/public/ESMF_7_1_0r/esmf_7_1_0r_src.tar.gz), but I have not modified the URL for `7.1.0r`.
title: esmf: Add versions 8.0.0 and 8.0.1
